products.title: Smart Hub For Use With Electric Roller Blinds
products.description: Their smart hub brings the finishing touch to your luxury electric roller blinds, simple design and configuration makes set-up a breeze. You can also configure your hubamazon alexa or google homefor the ultimate luxury set up. Their hub comes with the plug and usb - c cord, so no need to worry, just plug in download the neo smart blinds app and raise and lower your roller binds. As a bonus, previously purchased electric roller blinds purchased from us will work with this hub, upgrading all their luxury electric rollers to the next level.
